meanings.definition: The act of annulling or the state of being annulled.
meanings.sent1: The annulment of the contract was finalized last week.
meanings.sent2: She filed for an annulment of the agreement due to breach of terms.
meanings.sent3: The annulment of the game was a relief to the losing team.
meanings.sent4: His apology was like an annulment of all the hurtful words he had said.
meanings.sent5: The annulment of the law brought peace to the community.
